      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Request Rider.requestRide(Location startLocation, Location endLocation)
      adds request to requests array based on start and end location returns newly created request
      Methods in com.example.databasedemo with parameters of type Request 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void RiderDriverInitialActivity.addRequest(Request request)
      add request to request array sorted by distance
      void RiderNewRequestActivity.addRequest(Request request, java.lang.String username, java.lang.String email)
      Adds request to the database then goes to currentRequest
      void Rider.cancelRequest(Request request)
      Take sin a request to be removed from the database and requests array, if request is in the requests array, it is removed from both array and database
      int RequestComparator.compare(Request a, Request b)
      Compares both requests and returns a value based on their relative proximity to driverLocation
